summary: Can\'t find a mod that change your ugly Vanilla NPCs into beautiful NPCs ? This mod is made for you !
descriptionHtml:
First, sorry for my bad english, I\'m a French modder so I will try to explain as the best I can !
This is my first Skyrim mod, so please be forgiving !
 
I\'ve never find a mod that [u]really[/u] change some of the ugly vanilla NPCs, so I made one.


Commands are allowed.
If you want NPC(s) or new NPC(s) what I haven\'t uploaded yet, you can let a comment in the commentary section of this mod. Please try to describe as best you can or give me a Picture/Photo of your wanted NPC face when you let the command.

18-08-2012: \"Aela The Huntress v1a has been released ! You can download it now !\"
19-08-2012: \"I\'m actually working on: Ysolda, Camilla Valerius, Lydia, Hulda and Alvor in this order.\"
19-08-2012: \"Hulda v1a has been released ! You can download it now !\"
20-08-2012: \"I had some problems of Skyrim crash with some of the NPCs what I\'ve been working on, like Camilla Valerius, Lydia, Ysolda, and some others, so I\'m working on to fix crashes...\"
20-08-2012: \"I\'ve find the solution to fix crashes !(after 5 hours of research !) I will upload some NPCs today !\"
20-08-2012: \"Camilla Valerius v2b has been released ! You can download it now !\"
20-08-2012: \"I will upload more NPCs tomorrow, stay tuned for them !\"
21-08-2012: \"I had some problems of Skyrim crash with some of the NPCs once again...so I\'m working on to fix crashes...I hope that will not take 5 hours like the last time...\"
21-08-2012: \"I\'ve already problems of Skyrim crash...I will fix it tomorrow I think\"
22-08-2012: \"Olfina Gray-Mane v2a has been released ! You can download it now !\"
[color=red]23-08-2012: \"Thanks everyone for more than 100 downloads ! =)\"[/color]
23-08-2012: \"I think I will create a pack of new NPCs to thank you for downloading my mod\"
23-08-2012: \"No mod upload today, but I work hard to upload some what I\'ve finished tomorrow\"
24-08-2012: \"Aela The Huntress Lore-Friendly v1a has been released ! You can download it now !\"
24-08-2012: \"I\'m now working on some Lore-Friendly version of some NPCs what I\'ve re-made, I\'m also working on some other NPCs in Dawnstar and Falkreath like someone told me in the commentary section.\"
24-08-2012: \"Hulda Lore-Friendly v1a has been released ! You can download it now !\"
24-08-2012: \"Camilla Valerius Lore-Friendly v1a has been released ! You can download it now !\"
24-08-2012: \"I\'m actually working on Argis the Bulwark who\'s the Housecarl of Markarth.\"
25-08-2012: \"I will not upload some NPCs today, I\'m working really hard to update more than 1 or 2 NPCs a day. Stay tuned for tomorrow and tell your friends this mod exist if you like it and if you haven\'t do this yet ! =) And thanks for your support ! =)\"
26-08-2012: \"I think I\'ve found the solution of my problems of Skyrim crashes ! After 2 huge bugs, this is the biggest one, and if I\'ve really found the entire solution to delete this bug, it will be a lot more easy for me to upload NPCs, stay tuned of this mod, I will no doubt upload a lot of NPCs in coming days. =)\"
26-08-2012: \"Sorry, I think I will maybe at least upload 1 NPC today because of the solution I\'ve found ! But, no NPC(s) today with the solution of my principal bug will say more NPCs in coming days ! =D Stay tuned in the coming week for more uploads !\"
26-08-2012: \"Finally I will not upload 1 NPC today, I will upload him (yes it\'s a man ! =) ) tomorrow. I will do more NPCs tomorrow.\"
27-08-2012: \"Vignar Gray-Mane v1a has been released ! You can download it now !\"
28-08-2012: \"I\'m working on Farkas, and Vilkas actually, if you have any NPC(s) you want me to edit, tell me which one(s) you want in the commentary section !\"
29-08-2012: \"Sorry, some technical problems occurred and prevented me to work and upload some NPCs today.\"
30-08-2012: \"I will try to upload one NPC today because I would not have much time to =/ I will try to upload as soon as possible a pack of 10 or more NPCs.\"
31-08-2012: \"I\'m working hard on the NPCs pack, stay tuned and tell your friends !\"

If you want me to support this mod for a long time or if you like it, you are free to make a donation.


FAQ:
Q: \"Why I\'ve been taken through an ad site clicking on the download link ?!\"
A: \"Download my mods by clicking on the download links help me indireclty to make my mod, [u]you don\'t have to pay anything[/u], if [u]you just wait 5 seconds[/u], you help the autor of this mod, me. If you don\'t like something in my mod(s), or have a suggestion to improve them, please let a comment in the commentary section, I will try to answer you or/and modify my mod(s) to improve them as best I can !\"

Q: \"Will you create a version more realistic or lore-friendly of the NPCs ?\"
A: \"Yes, I\'m working on 3 versions actually, the 1st is the \"Beautiful version\", like you can see in the screens, the 2nd is a lore-friendly version (With warpaints or Freckles for exemple), and the 3rd version which is a more realistic version. If you want to submit your ideas/critics, you can do that by private messages or in the commentary section.\"


__________________________________

Program used: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4554]\"Skyrim NPC Editor 0_75_1\" by foretrenty[/url]

Bodys used: 
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition CBBE  -[i]by Caliente[/i]-[/url]
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4686]CBBE V3-V2 Calientes - CHSBHC Physic - Body Texture  4096   -[i]by AnTiWoMaAgNoT[/i]-[/url]
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4888]CHSBHC - BBP - Nude and Jiggly Mod  -[i]by CherryHotaling[/i]-[/url]

Heads/Faces used: 
-To create the NPCs I simply used the vanilla version of existing NPCs

Armor used: 
-CBBE armors and a lot of other which I will reveal soon.

Hairs used: 
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair  -[i]by Apachii[/i]-[/url]
-Tera hair (this one is not on Skyrim Nexus, the download link is in the readme)
author: Fl4sHNoX

files.name: Hulda v1b -Lips fix_replace the v1a version-
